t: Peace Arch Entertainment - Wikipedia
s: November 4, 2024 - Peace Arch Entertainment ("PAE") ... Vidatron Entertainment from 1985 until 1999, stylized as PEACE ARCH) was a Canadian motion picture and television production company based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, with offices in Los Angeles and Vancouver. The company produced and acquired feature films and television programs for worldwide distribution. It got filed for bankruptcy and disestablished in 2013. t: Amazon
Peace Arch Entertainment - Audiovisual Identity Database
s: March 25, 2025 - Peace Arch Entertainment was a Canadian film and TV company which was formed in 1981 as Medco Productions (then later on Vidatron) in Toronto, Ontario. In 2009, the company sold off its home media arm and Kaboom! Entertainment to Berry Meyerowitz, who used the assets to form Phase 4 Films.
